column4: Installed 12.04 on my Lenovo IdeaPad Z575. Suspends to RAM, but screen doesn't wake up.
I don't know if there are for my specific laptop model, I will check.
Lenovo IdeaPad Z575, is the model name.
seems to be an AMD Radeon HD 6380G
gdea73 did you install the proprietary video driver?
I was planning on it, so I might as well.
what video chip do you use?
if you press CTRL+ALT+F1 and log in there, then restart the lightdm service
that returned me to tty7 (login screen), wherein the problem persists
I ran that command in tty2, but still can't login in tty7.
I suggest you run:   less /var/log/Xorg.0.log      to see what is going on
